biotools.summary: Interactive visualization and exploration of metagenomic sequencing data. Provides a novel navigation tool for exploring hierarchical feature data that is coupled with multiple data visualizations including heatmaps, stacked bar charts, and scatter plots. It supports a flexible plugin framework so users can add new d3 visualizations.

bioschemas.name: Metaviz
